original_text: Their father Ephraim cried for them and he was sad for many days. And his family came to help him.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 에브라임이 여러 날 슬퍼하므로 그의 형제가 가서 위로하였더라

sentences.original_text: Their father Ephraim cried for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아버지 에브라임이 그들을 위해 울었고

sentences.original_text: and he was sad for many days
And his family came to help him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 가족이 그를 돕기 위해 왔다
